price: Gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah wanda Ya saukar da Littafi a kan bãwansa kuma bai sanya karkata ba a gare shi.
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عِوَجَاۜ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī anzala ʿalā ʿabdihi al-kitāba walam yajʿal lahu ʿiwajā
